feed.title: Core Devs : can you share your thoughts about all BIPs on this website ?

entry.title: Core Devs : can you share your thoughts about all BIPs on this website ?
entry.summary: On August 21, 2015, Btc Drak suggested that developers should explain their threat models and what should be at the root of their thinking about block size. Peter Todd via bitcoin-dev proposed that this could be valuable. The "Technical Opinion" column was suggested as a means to address this concern. The context includes a PGP signature.
